pageContext.claim: “Have you been seeing what's going on with our steel industry. We put steel tariffs on. U.S. Steel is now building six plants are expanding. The steel company today announced a 500-million-dollar plant, and that's first plant built in many, many years, it's a long time.”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. Steel has not announced the opening of six facilities, nor is there evidence that Trump had a phone call with the head of U.S. Steel. The company has only announced the reopening of two blast furnaces at a plant in Illinois.
